channel.title: CaribbeanPkz
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i191.photobucket.com/albums/z140/yasel16/Cpzlogo.gif[/img] I suck at Photoshop xD.
Well, I'm back, with another
[size=15pt]Pking server[/size]
Ok guys, you may have seen my other projects, KubanPkz, Universal X, Kubanscape. Now i'm back to coding, since i just bot in RS and do nothing else, i thoguh why not just keep coding ^_^. ( 91 fishing in RS btw ^ _^. )
Ok, about this project:
These are some notes i took while coding the server, there might be a shit load of incorrect spelling etc since i have never really looked over it. Also, it's out of date.
[code] Server Process: BEFORE| Client.Java = 1400KB ------------- NOT SURE AFTER| Client.Java = 907KB
Cleaned Void Process Removed A lot of skills With handlers Removed a lot of print_ln's, only left, log in, log out, and ::commands, (Thanks for the idea Rich) __________________________________________________________________________________________________
ONSCREEN UPDATING [ Unfinished ] Fight pits [ Done ] - 99.9% Shops [ Done ] - Were extremly glitchy. Defence system [ Done ] - Just made it a little better Prayer [ Done ] - Fixed some headicons and some bonuses Healing + food [ Done ] - Was glitchy as fuck Pk Following [ Done ] - Fixed it Npc Death [ Done ] Npc Following [ Done ] Agreesive Npcs [ Done ] Player Following [ Done ] Fully working Vengeance [ Done ] Fully working Warriors Guild + Shop with needed tokens. [ Done ] Fully working Barrows + Tunnel [ Done ] Working Dharoks Effect [ Done ] Working void, Melee, Range, and Mage [ Done ] Working Dark Bow [ Done ] Specials 80% - Missing some ( UNUSED ) Weapons Better SYI protection [ Done ] Added AutoCasting Added 75% - 80% Duel Arena Removed Duel Arena, Glitchy + Messed up my trading. Added 95% Normal Magic & Ancient With correct GFX + animations. - 50% To Prima
Client Process: _______________________________________________________________________________________________
Config Interface - 100% Emote Interface - 100% Lunar INterface - 100% Prayer Interface 100% like runescape - 80% ~ Not all prayers work [ Range + Mage Bonus Ones ] General Graa... From Godwars. Dark Bow DragonHead Proctiles. Skillcapes Animators Worrior Guild Npcs Skillcape Masters Custom Items. - NO RECOLORED ITEMS. - [/code]
I also want to thank Prima for her incredible base and for inspiering me to keep coding.
I really don't know what else to say. Um, there have been a lot of glitches, and the Main glitch,
[size=13pt]Onscreen Updating.[/size]
A lot of ZDR servers have this, i really can't figure out how to fix this [s]FUCKING JEWISH GLITCH[/s] annoing glitch. Also, if you know how to fix it, please add my msn: TehKuban@hotmail.com Thanks, <3.
Fight pits took me kinda long and its not 100% but its something. Right now I'm working on fight caves, its pritty hard, i don't want to have the Gay 5 wave jad normal Czar has. I have all 3 Jad attacks, i just need to make a timer. I added dueling and it started great, but it ended horrible, it fucked up my trading :|, so i deleted that. Pk following had a glitch which wasn't hard to fix. When a player ran out of wild, the attacker kept running after him. Shops were messed up, well, i messed them up trying to remove " First NPC click." but i fixed it. I also named the portals, client sided. ( forgot to get a picture ) Barrows... Thanks to prima. Warrior's guild... Prima. ( And i fixed the Adamant one ) All prayers work exept, Summoning, Range, and mage bonus...giver...thingies... It's 100% 317 though, with piety & chav. Dbow special... Prima Ava's Accumulator, ME it took a few tries, first time, arrows never droped XD, second time in one shot, it droped them all. After a few more tries i got it. Not 100% but works kinda good :\.
Ok now for Pictures:
Client [IMG]http://i191.photobucket.com/albums/z140/yasel16/c1.jpg[/img]
CMD - Removed a lot of print_lns. ( thanks for the idea rich ) [IMG]http://i191.photobucket.com/albums/z140/yasel16/cmd1.jpg[/img]
Fight Pits [IMG]http://i191.photobucket.com/albums/z140/yasel16/Fpits1.jpg[/img]
Some GFX's [IMG]http://i191.photobucket.com/albums/z140/yasel16/gfxssss1.jpg[/img]
Interfaces [IMG]http://i191.photobucket.com/albums/z140/yasel16/inter1.jpg[/img]
Prayers [IMG]http://i191.photobucket.com/albums/z140/yasel16/Prayerz.jpg[/img]
Some Shops - Please say if i should remove items, ALSO REMEMBER, It's A PKING SERVER. [IMG]http://i191.photobucket.com/albums/z140/yasel16/shops1.jpg[/img]
Last but not least, Warrior's Guild [IMG]http://i191.photobucket.com/albums/z140/yasel16/wg1.jpg[/img]
Hopefully i don't get bad comments, comment & suggest nicely please.
[i]Note[/i]: [i]Please tell me if you can't see the pictures, because i know sometimes you see like the X's shit.[/i]
Thanks, Kuban.

item.description:
@Kubanito wrote:

The Jewish glitch is Onscreen Updating.Most Zdiddy’s have this. I have heard Prima has fixed it.
Prima help would be appreciated ;D.

And yes 900KB client.java is a lot, but i started from a lot worse. Since it’s a pking server, i removed a lot of skills sadly.
I failed once again in duel arena, i got closer though.

ATM I’m trying to clean process. Prima, you are one messing coder ^_^.
